articles.author: Vladimir Isachenkov, Yuras Karmanau And Lorne Cook
articles.title: Biden: 'Every indication' Russia prepared to attack Ukraine - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Fears of a new war in Europe resurged Thursday as U.S. President Joe Biden warned that Russia could invade Ukraine within days, and violence spiked in a long-running standoff in eastern Ukraine that some fear could be the spark for wider conflict.
articles.content: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) - Fears of a new war in Europe resurged Thursday as U.S. President Joe Biden warned that Russia could invade Ukraine within days, and violence spiked in a long-running standoff in … [+8660 chars]

articles.author: Lenin Ndebele
articles.title: Southern African leaders arrive in Brussels for EU-AU Summit with high hopes - News24
articles.description: Southern African heads of state and their representatives have started arriving in Brussels, Belgium, for the 6th European Union-African Union Summit with high hopes for their respective countries.
articles.content:
• President Emmerson Mnangagwa of Zimbabwe is seeking to re-engage with a post-UK EU gathering.
  • Zambia's president, Hakainde Hichilema, is wishing for more access to the European trade … [+3618 chars]

articles.title: Buhari arrives in Belgium for EU-AU summit - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Buhari (retd.), has arrived in Brussels, Belgium, where he will join other world leaders for the 6th European Union-African Union Summit.
articles.content:
Published16 February 2022
